experiences.description: Developed and maintained core modules of a high-performance trading platform using Java. Implemented distributed caching strategies to improve system responsiveness. Mentored junior developers on best practices.

Led a team of engineers in building a scalable data processing pipeline using Hadoop and Spark. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for data ingestion and retrieval. Collaborated with data scientists to develop machine learning models.

Designed and implemented a microservices architecture for a cloud-based platform. Defined architectural standards and guidelines for the organization. Provided technical leadership and guidance to development teams. Evaluated new technologies and made recommendations for adoption. Focused on scalability, security, and reliability.

education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on algorithms, data structures, and distributed systems. Completed a senior project on parallel computing.
Specialized in cloud computing and large-scale data processing. Conducted research on distributed consensus algorithms. Published a paper on fault-tolerant systems.
